casebody.data:
RICHARDSON
v.
DEPT. OF PUBLIC INST. No. 642A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. Laura E. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Public Instruction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of March 2005 by Plaintiff of Rule 59A(2)(4) and 60(b) Rescinding Appellate Motion to Dismiss Plaintiff's Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2005."
